ygData.messageBody:
http://eq.castersrealm.com/viewarticle.asp?Article=3126

Logged onto my Bard last night....walked one zone, realized I was slow, logged and played on Tallon Zek for a while (newby Barbarians are such fun!)

--Khelan, Bard of 47 songs on Tarew Marr.

>>> Stephane Lange<slange@...> 01/10/01 08:11AM >>>

Do you really don't know the answer ?


-----Message d'origine-----
De : Mott, Mike J. [mailto:mike.j.mott@...]
Envoye : mercredi 10 janvier 2001 14:55
A : 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Objet : [eqbards] Percussion Bonus for Selos Broken


I hate being right about something like this :(. I really would
like to know why such a blatant bug on test would be propped to the live
servers.

Also, why is it that i can no longer outrun sow speeds without the
drum? Prepatch I was still faster than SOW without an instrument, now i am a
bit slower.

Lago
